short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect Instil to Gmail and Outlook to give  instant access to giving history to support individualized communications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The power of holistic constituent data, right inside your inbox.

Connect Instil to your Gmail and Outlook accounts to supercharge your conversations with instant access to constituent information including giving history, most recent contributions and more.

Access constituent data directly from your inbox and make every one-on-one email a personalized interaction, without spending time navigating between applications and looking up individual information.

Access and add directly to your emails:
Individual Giving Summary
Household Giving Summary
Last Contribution
Contribution History
& More

Note: An Instil account is required to use this extension. Learn more at https://www.instil.io.
